tool_description: Classifies products using Harmonized System (HS) codes and determines applicable duty rates for international shipping.

product_name.description: Name or title of the product

product_description.description: Detailed description of the product including materials and purpose

product_category.description: General product category (electronics, clothing, food, etc.)

destination_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for destination

origin_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code for country of origin

error_messages: Product classification failed: Insufficient product information provided for accurate HS code determination.
Invalid country codes: Provide valid two-letter ISO country codes for origin and destination.
Ambiguous product description: Product description is too vague for accurate classification.
Restricted product classification: Product may require special licenses or is prohibited for the destination country.
usage: Provide detailed product_name, product_description, destination_country, and origin_country. Optionally specify product_category for better accuracy. Returns HS classification and duty information.

hs_description.description: Official description for the HS code

trade_agreements.description: List of applicable trade agreements that may affect duties
